body:
Everyone on Nebula is getting frustrated with the glitch on walking on the slabs or stairs
can the staff please fix this problem it is getting a little bit annoying thank you

title: Nebula Glitch with Slabs and Stairs

replies.body: I've noticed this in Avicade for the gamemode where you run from the person with the axe.

replies.body: This glitch is for example u walk on a slab u get teleported back to the block u were before u did that action
